entry.title: from the rooftops
entry.summary:
Author: sterek24 (mooncry89)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,408Chapters: 4/17Kudos: 156

Summary: Stiles Stilinski moved to Poland after the events of the Nogitsune. He's been away from Beacon Hills ever since. Now, several years later, he's back and he's bringing a few familiar faces with him. The Nemeton has been visiting Stiles's dreams, telling him he needs to come home - so that's what he's going to do. Oh, and he's going to rebuild the Hale Pack, too, no matter what True Alpha Scott McCall thinks about that.

entry.title: I knew you were trouble
entry.summary:
Author: norman123

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,839Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 104

Summary: Derek has never been particularly interested in Peter’s personal life, but when his uncle returns from Canada with a new "husband," he realizes—this is a disaster.Stiles is too loud, too bold, and far too good at getting in his way.Derek is certain that there’s something off about this "marriage," but the more he watches Stiles, the harder it becomes to ignore that anger isn’t the only thing he feels.What if he isn’t furious because Stiles became part of their family—but because he didn’t become part of his life?

entry.title: Who’s That Hot Guy in My Hospital Room?
entry.summary:
Author: PheonixInk

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 697Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 64

Summary: Stiles wakes up groggy, sore, and drugged out of his mind after surgery. When a ruggedly handsome guy with stubble, muscles, and eyes like a storm walks into the hospital room, Stiles thinks he’s died and gone to heaven. He’s pretty sure this dude is the sexiest man he’s ever seen. So obviously, he starts flirting like his life depends on it. What he doesn’t realize is that he’s hitting on his husband. Derek. The man who’s been sleeping upright in a plastic chair for the past 17 hours and hasn’t stopped worrying since Stiles was wheeled into the OR.

entry.title: from flesh and bone
entry.summary:
Author: seaweedwater

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 80,600Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 60

Summary: “Do you think psychopaths can fall in love?”Stiles blinks and slants his head, studying Derek's face, eyebrows drawing in a fraction as he considers his answer.“I think true love requires empathy, which people with antisocial personality disorders tend to lack. But to answer your question, yes. It may be their version of what they believe love is. If they’ve convinced themselves it’s true, it is.”Derek hums in response with a short bob of his head, holding Stiles’ gaze.“Is that what you’ve gleaned so far, if psychopaths can love?” Stiles asks him, his tone curious.Derek shrugs. “Some of it, yeah. It just seems like someone with so much passion would be capable of such a thing.”

entry.title: Of All The Names I Gave You, My Favourite One is MINE!
entry.summary:
Author: NiklausScratchIII

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,658Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 60

Summary: Stiles is the new wolf in town, on the run from something he's not ready to face. Derek is a new single parent, and has no idea what he's doing, but hes doing his best dammit. A desperate moment finds the two wolves forging a unplanned bond that might just heal them both. Will their vastly different needs find a way to align, or is a neighbor wolf just a neighbor wolf at the end of the day.orDerek is drowning in single parent fatherhood. Stiles loves babies. Derek might be ready for love even if it's not ready for him. Stiles has a dark past and big secret. And Eli...hes just a baby.

entry.summary:

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,232Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 111

Summary: Stiles wakes up in a world that isn’t his—in a body that shouldn’t be his. Familiar faces surround him, yet everything feels wrong. Worst of all? With memories that aren’t his own and a past that doesn’t add up, Stiles must unravel the truth before he loses himself completely.

entry.title: The Creator's Game
entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,087Chapters: 12/38Kudos: 23

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.

entry.title: Love & Drug Both Have 4 Letters
entry.summary:
Author: thebigoblin

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,361Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 20

Summary: Derek doesn't reply. Instead, he fakes rummaging around in his pants, which are bit tight to comfortably rummage in, but he does the act for his audience of one. Nothing comes out of his pockets when he removes his hands, and Stiles' eyes follow them when Derek brings them both near his lips, blows a kiss onto them."Here, my love for you.
